## Experiment

```{r}

(theme_bw() + 
  theme(text = marquee::element_marquee())) |> 
  theme_set()

library(marquee)

ggplot(cars) + 
  annotate("marquee", 
           label = "Cars are so great because",
           width = .2,
           style = classic_style(),
           x = I(.25),
           y = I(.75)) 


fancy_font <- classic_style(
  weight = "semibold",
  features = systemfonts::font_feature(
    ligatures = c("standard", "discretionary"),
    letters = c("stylistic", "swash", "historical")
  )
)

ggplot(mtcars, aes(disp, mpg, label = rownames(mtcars))) +
  geom_marquee(style = fancy_font, size = 2.5, family = "spectral")

```
